#summary JQuery Editable plugin customization
*[Overview]* > Customization/API
= Introduction =

JQuery !DataTables Editable plugin enables developers to customize functionalities, modify behaviour of the plugin, and attach events to the plugin.

!DataTables Editable plugin provides API for customisation of default functionalites. Functionalities that can be modified are:
 * Attaching events to the add, delete, and update actions. See [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/events.html live demo] for details.
 * Customizing functions that are called before and after AJAX call are performed. See [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/events.html live demo] for details.
 * Customization of user interface and HTML code that is used on the web page. See [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/customization.html live demo] for details.
 * Customization of the error message handlers. See [http://jquery-datatables-editable.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/custom-messages.html live demo] for details.
